outline.title: 楔子：2002年的中关村与六个不安分的灵魂 (Prologue: Zhongguancun in 2002 and Six Restless Souls)
1. 草莽英雄的时代 (The Era of Grassroots Heroes)
1.1. 一间出租屋，一台破电脑，一个疯狂的想法 (A Rented Room, a Broken Computer, a Crazy Idea)
outline.parent: 1. 草莽英雄的时代 (The Era of Grassroots Heroes)

outline.title: 1.2. 石头：代码是刀，键盘是枪，理想是姑娘 (Shi Tou: Code is a Knife, Keyboard is a Gun, Ideal is a Girl)
outline.parent: 1. 草莽英雄的时代 (The Era of Grassroots Heroes)

outline.title: 1.3. 张琨：野路子销售，一张嘴皮子跑天下 (Zhang Kun: Wild Salesman, Smooth Talker)
outline.parent: 1. 草莽英雄的时代 (The Era of Grassroots Heroes)

outline.title: 1.4. 明哥：闷骚技术男，服务器是他的情人 (Ming Ge: Introverted Tech Guy, Servers are His Lovers)
outline.parent: 1. 草莽英雄的时代 (The Era of Grassroots Heroes)

outline.title: 1.5. 晓阳：设计鬼才，审美是第一生产力 (Xiao Yang: Design Genius, Aesthetics are the Primary Productivity)
outline.parent: 1. 草莽英雄的时代 (The Era of Grassroots Heroes)

outline.title: 1.6. Daniel：海归精英，忽悠投资人的本事一流 (Daniel: Returned Elite, Master of Pitching to Investors)
outline.parent: 1. 草莽英雄的时代 (The Era of Grassroots Heroes)

outline.title: 1.7. 三石：沉默寡言，代码如诗，Bug如仇 (San Shi: Silent and寡言, Code is Poetry, Bugs are Enemies)
outline.parent: 1. 草莽英雄的时代 (The Era of Grassroots Heroes)

outline.title: 2. 蜜蜂会（MiForum）的诞生：野蛮生长 (The Birth of MiForum: Wild Growth)
2.1. 论坛上线：糙是糙了点，但能用就行 (Forum Launch: Rough Around the Edges, But Functional)
outline.parent: 2. 蜜蜂会（MiForum）的诞生：野蛮生长 (The Birth of MiForum: Wild Growth)

outline.title: 2.2. 第一批用户：医生们的吐槽大会，信息孤岛的破冰尝试 (First Users: Doctors' Rant Conference, Breaking the Information Silo)
outline.parent: 2. 蜜蜂会（MiForum）的诞生：野蛮生长 (The Birth of MiForum: Wild Growth)

outline.title: 2.3. 办公室里的暧昧：石头和萧薰儿的第一次心动 (Office Ambiguity: Shi Tou and Xiao Xun'er's First Heartbeat)
outline.parent: 2. 蜜蜂会（MiForum）的诞生：野蛮生长 (The Birth of MiForum: Wild Growth)

outline.title: 2.4. 初尝资本的滋味：天使轮融资的艰难谈判 (First Taste of Capital: Difficult Angel Round Negotiations)
outline.parent: 2. 蜜蜂会（MiForum）的诞生：野蛮生长 (The Birth of MiForum: Wild Growth)

outline.title: 2.5. 竞争对手出现：行业老炮的降维打击 (Competitors Emerge: Industry Veterans' Dimensional Reduction Strike)
outline.parent: 2. 蜜蜂会（MiForum）的诞生：野蛮生长 (The Birth of MiForum: Wild Growth)

outline.title: 2.6. 技术瓶颈：明哥和三石的通宵达旦，以及咖啡和泡面的味道 (Technical Bottleneck: Ming Ge and San Shi's All-Nighters, and the Taste of Coffee and Instant Noodles)
outline.parent: 2. 蜜蜂会（MiForum）的诞生：野蛮生长 (The Birth of MiForum: Wild Growth)

outline.title: 3. 危机与裂痕：低谷期的挣扎 (Crisis and Rifts: Struggles in the Low Period)
3.1. 资金链断裂：Daniel的融资失败，团队陷入绝境 (Capital Chain Break: Daniel's Fundraising Failure, Team in Desperate Situation)
outline.parent: 3. 危机与裂痕：低谷期的挣扎 (Crisis and Rifts: Struggles in the Low Period)

outline.title: 3.2. 核心成员出走：雅妃的诱惑，张琨的动摇 (Departure of Core Members: Ya Fei's Temptation, Zhang Kun's Wavering)
outline.parent: 3. 危机与裂痕：低谷期的挣扎 (Crisis and Rifts: Struggles in the Low Period)

outline.title: 3.3. 办公室恋情的狗血：石头和萧薰儿的争吵，以及另一个女生的出现 (Soap Opera Office Romance: Shi Tou and Xiao Xun'er's Quarrel, and the Appearance of Another Girl)
outline.parent: 3. 危机与裂痕：低谷期的挣扎 (Crisis and Rifts: Struggles in the Low Period)

outline.title: 3.4. 产品方向迷失：抄袭还是创新？团队的路线之争 (Product Direction Lost: Copy or Innovate? Team's Route Dispute)
outline.parent: 3. 危机与裂痕：低谷期的挣扎 (Crisis and Rifts: Struggles in the Low Period)

outline.title: 3.5. 竞争对手的恶意收购：釜底抽薪，生死存亡 (Competitor's Hostile Takeover: Pulling Out the Rug, Life or Death)
outline.parent: 3. 危机与裂痕：低谷期的挣扎 (Crisis and Rifts: Struggles in the Low Period)

outline.title: 3.6. 兄弟情义的考验：绝境中的信任与背叛 (Test of Brotherhood: Trust and Betrayal in Desperation)
outline.parent: 3. 危机与裂痕：低谷期的挣扎 (Crisis and Rifts: Struggles in the Low Period)

outline.title: 4. 绝地反击：涅槃重生的力量 (Desperate Counterattack: The Power of Rebirth)
4.1. 石头的顿悟：技术才是硬道理，用户体验为王 (Shi Tou's Realization: Technology is the Key, User Experience is King)
outline.parent: 4. 绝地反击：涅槃重生的力量 (Desperate Counterattack: The Power of Rebirth)

outline.title: 4.2. 新产品的诞生：MiForum 2.0，颠覆式创新 (Birth of a New Product: MiForum 2.0, Disruptive Innovation)
outline.parent: 4. 绝地反击：涅槃重生的力量 (Desperate Counterattack: The Power of Rebirth)

outline.title: 4.3. 明哥和三石的技术爆发：代码优化，性能飞跃 (Ming Ge and San Shi's Technical Explosion: Code Optimization, Performance Leap)
outline.parent: 4. 绝地反击：涅槃重生的力量 (Desperate Counterattack: The Power of Rebirth)

outline.title: 4.4. 晓阳的美学升级：界面改版，抓住年轻用户的心 (Xiao Yang's Aesthetic Upgrade: Interface Redesign, Capturing Young Users' Hearts)
outline.parent: 4. 绝地反击：涅槃重生的力量 (Desperate Counterattack: The Power of Rebirth)

outline.title: 4.5. 张琨的回归与救赎：重新加入，带来新的销售策略 (Zhang Kun's Return and Redemption: Rejoining, Bringing New Sales Strategies)
outline.parent: 4. 绝地反击：涅槃重生的力量 (Desperate Counterattack: The Power of Rebirth)

outline.title: 4.6. Daniel的再次出击：新的融资，新的希望 (Daniel's Re-attack: New Funding, New Hope)
outline.parent: 4. 绝地反击：涅槃重生的力量 (Desperate Counterattack: The Power of Rebirth)

outline.title: 4.7. 爱情的转机：石头和萧薰儿的和解，以及新的情感萌芽 (Turning Point in Love: Shi Tou and Xiao Xun'er's Reconciliation, and New Emotional Sprouts)
outline.parent: 4. 绝地反击：涅槃重生的力量 (Desperate Counterattack: The Power of Rebirth)

outline.title: 5. 乘风破浪：快速扩张与行业领先 (Riding the Waves: Rapid Expansion and Industry Leadership)
5.1. 用户爆发式增长：口碑效应，病毒式传播 (Explosive User Growth: Word-of-Mouth Effect, Viral Spread)
outline.parent: 5. 乘风破浪：快速扩张与行业领先 (Riding the Waves: Rapid Expansion and Industry Leadership)

outline.title: 5.2. 商业模式升级：从论坛到平台，打造医疗信息化生态 (Business Model Upgrade: From Forum to Platform, Building a Medical Information Ecosystem)
outline.parent: 5. 乘风破浪：快速扩张与行业领先 (Riding the Waves: Rapid Expansion and Industry Leadership)

outline.title: 5.3. 团队扩张：招兵买马，吸纳各路精英 (Team Expansion: Recruiting Troops, Attracting Elites from All Walks of Life)
outline.parent: 5. 乘风破浪：快速扩张与行业领先 (Riding the Waves: Rapid Expansion and Industry Leadership)

outline.title: 5.4. 进军海外市场：全球化战略，挑战国际巨头 (Entering Overseas Markets: Globalization Strategy, Challenging International Giants)
outline.parent: 5. 乘风破浪：快速扩张与行业领先 (Riding the Waves: Rapid Expansion and Industry Leadership)

outline.title: 5.5. 办公室的诱惑与坚守：面对新的情感挑战 (Office Temptation and Perseverance: Facing New Emotional Challenges)
outline.parent: 5. 乘风破浪：快速扩张与行业领先 (Riding the Waves: Rapid Expansion and Industry Leadership)

outline.title: 5.6. 行业地位确立：成为医疗信息化领域的独角兽 (Industry Status Established: Becoming a Unicorn in the Medical Information Field)
outline.parent: 5. 乘风破浪：快速扩张与行业领先 (Riding the Waves: Rapid Expansion and Industry Leadership)

outline.title: 6. 巅峰时刻：IPO之路与新的征程 (Peak Moment: The Road to IPO and a New Journey)
6.1. 启动IPO：资本市场的洗礼，走向公众视野 (Launching IPO: Baptism of the Capital Market, Moving Towards Public View)
outline.parent: 6. 巅峰时刻：IPO之路与新的征程 (Peak Moment: The Road to IPO and a New Journey)

outline.title: 6.2. 路演与质疑：面对投资人的审视，证明价值 (Roadshow and Questioning: Facing Investors' Scrutiny, Proving Value)
outline.parent: 6. 巅峰时刻：IPO之路与新的征程 (Peak Moment: The Road to IPO and a New Journey)

outline.title: 6.3. 上市敲钟：梦想照进现实，新的起点 (Listing and Bell Ringing: Dreams Come True, New Starting Point)
outline.parent: 6. 巅峰时刻：IPO之路与新的征程 (Peak Moment: The Road to IPO and a New Journey)

outline.title: 6.4. 功成名就后的反思：兄弟情义，初心不改 (Reflection After Success: Brotherhood, Original Intention Unchanged)
outline.parent: 6. 巅峰时刻：IPO之路与新的征程 (Peak Moment: The Road to IPO and a New Journey)

outline.title: 6.5. 未来的展望：星辰大海，永不止步 (Future Outlook: Starry Sea, Never Stop)
outline.parent: 6. 巅峰时刻：IPO之路与新的征程 (Peak Moment: The Road to IPO and a New Journey)

outline.title: 尾声：蜜蜂会的故事，未完待续 (Epilogue: The Story of MiForum, To Be Continued)
